data.title: The Sheep Pig Comprehension [Chapter 5]
data.meta_description: A set of Comprehension questions based on Chapter 5 (‘Keep Yelling, Young Un’) of The Sheep Pig. There are three sets of differentiated questions including a set of
data.text:
A set of Comprehension questions based on Chapter 5 (‘Keep Yelling, Young Un’) of The Sheep Pig. There are three sets of differentiated questions including a set of questions which have sentences with key words/information missing for children to complete using a word bank for lower ability/SEN children.
